title: En tout cas
overview: En tout cas refers to a common expression used by Quebec mothers to subtly express their disapproval to their kids. The series will focus on the sometimes tender, sometimes stormy – and always comical – relationship between Danielle, her daughter Chloé and her son Fred. The story unfolds as Danielle – who's lived her entire life in a small town – moves to Montreal, where her kids have been living for several years.
